LanguageData.CSCPudding.label: Christmas pudding
LanguageData.CSCPudding.description: Christmas pudding is a type of pudding traditionally served as part of the Christmas dinner.
LanguageData.CSSuet.label: Suet
LanguageData.CSSuet.description: Suet is the raw, hard fat of beef or mutton found around the loins and kidneys.
